Articles.Content: I am Daman, i am a new member and i just pulled a mile stone, first Orbit. right now i am pulling from obit and is crashing into Kerbal.

Welcome to the forums Daman453.

Well Done, your first orbit is a great milestone in KSP, hopefully soon you will be shooting towards the Mun and land on it. Hope you attached a parachute.

Good Luck flying your rockets and congratulations.

Hi Daman453, welcome to the community

Congratulations on reaching orbit, from orbit it is only a matter of time before you reach the Mun and the planets

Yeah, orbits are the only reliable way to sling shot your way to other planets, just pointing at a planet is REALLY ineffective.

Trust me...
